website_summaries.verdict: Edged out by our Best of the Best and Best Bang choices for quality and price.
pros: You get two jars for one price
cons: Some reviewers found that it turns to liquid faster at lower room temperatures than others we tested

customer_reviews.title: She’s been itching so bad she’s going bald in a few spots
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this coconut oil to help with my dogs allergies. She’s been itching so bad she’s going bald in a few spots. I put this directly onto her skin in the places she itches the most. It did help but not as much as actually feeding the coconut oil to her did. So now I’m adding it to her food daily and applying the coconut oil to her fur at night. I’ve been doing this for a month now and her fur is getting super soft and she itches so much less. UPDATE: her fur finally grew back!! Still feed this to her daily.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney W.

customer_reviews.title: Super disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product once before and it was amazing but this second time the taste and texture of the coconut oil are so off that I will be throwing it completely. I understand that I was having a good deal but if paying less money equal having a bad product then I don't want it. I used it for cooking and also for body use and I thought maybe I could just use for body since the taste was so bad but I use it on my body and the smell was just terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Marie-Lou Gingras

customer_reviews.title: really amazon
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this 3 stars for 3 reasons 1. The package was very poor and broke the lid off the jar, so I have to take all of the coconut oil out of the jar and put into other containers for use 2 the coconut oil jar its self is dirty and dusty for some reason. 3 the box it came in was ripped opened at some point and possibly damaged my other order that came with it
customer_reviews.author: carson

customer_reviews.title: Coconut oil itself is good, however I doubt I will order from this ...
customer_reviews.text: Coconut oil itself is good, however I doubt I will order from this company again. 1/3 was already gone upon opening. My previous jar was from Trader Joe's; has 1oz less than this jar claims to have, and it was filled completely to the top despite the container being about the same size. I can see the two containers aren't exactly the same in volume, but the actual displacement of oil seems too drastic; especially with Nutiva claiming to have one ounce MORE. Also I've learned I prefer the glass jars over this white plastic jar; makes it hard to see when it is leaking (and it is ALWAYS leaking) and whether the oil is liquid or solid.
customer_reviews.author: isabellamaxine

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the first bottle came in expired, the second one expired a month after I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Cokash

customer_reviews.title: I tried coconut oil at the store and nothing compared to this nothing this is nice and thick
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a 100 if I could. I tried coconut oil at the store and nothing compared to this nothing this is nice and thick. It soaks in fast and well. I do oil pulling. I use it as a moisturizer for my skin, I have uritha issues do to IC and this I but on my uritha and it helps the pain from getting out of hand! It whitens up my teeth without the bleach. My cat loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Usually I buy this product with no problems but this time I feel like someone pulled a fast one
customer_reviews.text: This product came with two expiration dates. One if which was expired and the other expires in two years. There was advertising in the lid from before 2015. I did not notice in time to return because I did not need to use it before then. It has a rancid undertone. Usually I buy this product with no problems but this time I feel like someone pulled a fast one.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Meikle

customer_reviews.title: Best Coconut Oil I Have Purchased at the Best Price!
customer_reviews.text: I often make handmade lotion gifts for friends and family with coconut oil that I whip with aloe vera, lavendar, and essential oils. This was the best coconut oil that I have used to make these gifts and will certainly be purchasing again! I put the whipped lotion inthese cute jars and bagged them up with these bagsthat I lined withand it turned out super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Spchtch76

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully for our pups' skin
customer_reviews.text: Got this to add to our dog's food as she has skin problems due to allergies and dermatitis. One vet keep recommending more antibiotics via pills and creams, but those gave her terrible gastric upset and made her (and us) miserable. Finally by chance we saw another vet who recommended we try adding some all natural coconut oil to her food, and what a difference it has made. Fewer flare ups of skin yeast infections or itchy patches and her coat is softer. We added the coconut oil a little bit at a time so it didn't upset her tummy. It's done so well for her that we've started adding it to the food for our other dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Radar626Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Nasty would not describe it
customer_reviews.text: Nasty would not describe it smells and taste like plastic, ruined dinner and all christmas baking and husband was appalled.
customer_reviews.author: angelgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great for skin. Reliable value.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third jar. I don't look for other brands now, I just buy this. I use it every day. I use it for my skin, primarily. My second use is cooking. Use #1: In cold winter months, my skin used get so dry. Now I apply this to my skin after my shower and I no longer have that issue. Use #2: this makes a great makeup remover. Use #3: cooking. Wow, this adds so much to a dish. Great in curries. We use it as a cooking oil to fry up shrimp. Coconut oil can be so expensive if you buy it at a grocery store. I'm glad I have found a better source on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jonni C

customer_reviews.title: Kimberly Snyder recommends Nutiva coconut oil
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Nutiva coconut oil since early 2011. Since that time my (hypo) thyroid has improved greatly. I implemented coconut oil in my cooking every day, along with taking one tablespoon on a daily basis. I lost around 20 pounds just by this change alone in 2011. I actually love the taste of this coconut oil and I find that I cannot live without it. I especially love to FRY my plantain chips in this coconut oil, it gives it such a sweet tropical taste!! I also add 1 teaspoon of coconut oil to my rice cooker as well. By the way, Kimberly Snyder (nutritionist to the stars) recommends this exact brand of coconut oil !
customer_reviews.author: Liset

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what the smell was, but it appeared ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what the smell was, but it appeared not to be pure coconut oil. Didn't smell natural and fresh as it always has. I'll be looking for another seller. Not even sure if this container is safe?? I normally feed it to the dogs but I threw this away when I smelled it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan R.

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing, not sure about hair yet
customer_reviews.text: After so many recommendations, I had to try coconut oil in my hair. This one was suggested by a lot of bloggers You get a really big tub, like biiiig, for your money and its suggested to apply it to dry hair (before washing) wet hair (after washing) and as/when need a boost. Smells yummy. Takes a couple seconds to warm up so you can smooth it - lumpy texture - then goes on nicely. I don't really know if its done anything yet - used for a few days, but think its helping with hair lubrication - letting hairs lie smooth and next to easchother, not pyramid hair anymore. will update in a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Lima

customer_reviews.title: Good quality coconut oil.
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be a very good quality coconut oil. Great flavor, pleasant coconut smell. I love using this coconut oil to make popcorn. Half the price of my local store. I will be ordering again!
customer_reviews.author: Jonette Bumgarner

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Organic. Healthy. Tastes great! Good for your body inside and out! Fights fungus/Candida, sickness and just about everything! Two TBS a day on Candida diet will get rid of Candida overgrowth! What more needs said? This organic coconut oil is well worth the money and you get a lot for your dollar!
customer_reviews.author: Lyn Leahz

customer_reviews.title: A bit more coconut flavor than other brands.
customer_reviews.text: The coconut oil is good, but has more ‘coconut’ flavor than I’m used to. I buy & use coconut oil a lot & this is the first that I can taste the coconut flavor come through in everything I use it in. I drink coconut milk instead of almond, so I like coconut flavor... but to taste it in peanut butter fat bombs where it overpowers the peanut butter flavor (& in the chocolate topping layer) surprised me. I’ve altered the amounts of both the PB & Coconut oil trying to lessen it being overpowering, but it doesn’t. I will use this to cook in, but I’m going back to my other brand to use as an ingredient in recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Whitni A.

customer_reviews.title: Truly nutritious.
customer_reviews.text: I love that this product is good for consumption, I think oil is very important for brain health, my husband likes to have a tablespoon or two first thing in the morning, he has also lost weight with it as part of his diet and fasting. I use it to moisturize my skin and hair sometimes, you can cook with it even though it does have a slight coconut taste but it is so good raw. This is the brand I like the most. If you’re coconut oil pulling this would be your best choice.
customer_reviews.author: carla m

customer_reviews.title: over $9 for such a little jar
customer_reviews.text: Just got my order and will be returning based on the little bitty jar that arrived. 16oz or not, for this little jar it is way over priced. Worth maybe $6.
customer_reviews.author: Wrecking Beast

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Its smells great, its tastes great, I use it for Oil pulling and it has been working for me. What is Coconut Oil Pulling, its where its cleans your teeth, gets rid of all the germs, cavities, bad breath. you take a tablespoon of it every morning before you brush your teeth let it roll around in your mouth for 5 minutes and then spit it out. the oil works really well for me in general bad teeth germs line runs in the family, even going to the dentist only helps for some time, but oil pulling A++ You get only thing brand, well this brand works for me
customer_reviews.author: Colleen E

customer_reviews.title: Almost tasteless and soft
customer_reviews.text: I have used several brands of coconut oil over the past two years and have found most of them quite similar in taste, appearance, and smell. My wife and I both use coconut oil for whitening our teeth, and in that regard there is not much difference, if any. However, anyone who has used this oil already knows it gets hard in cold conditions: even when stored in a kitchen cabinet. That is where Nutiva takes the lead. As of this review, it has remained soft and pleasurable to use. I do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: J-Lee

customer_reviews.title: So many uses!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for EVERYTHING! I bake with coconut oil, I put it in my coffee with some vanilla, I use it as moisturizer, I give it to my dogs, I brush my dogs teeth with coconut oil and baking soda, I put it in wet hair to tame and smooth. The uses are endless. This product doesn’t fail.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Better than drugs for raising your HDLs .
customer_reviews.text: This is the most reasonably priced organic unrefined coconut oil available and worth every penny. Buy Bruce Fife’s books: Coconut Cures & Oil Pulling Therapy books. My HDLs are from 87-105 depending on my conditioning level which is crazy. Do not waste your money on cholesterol lowering drugs. Your total cholesterol will always go up with coconut oil but the HDLs will skyrocket and your endurance will increase exponentially. I’ve had a resting HR before of 35-37 bpm weighing 223 lbs and a type 1 juvenile diabetic!! Previously my HDLs were 60-62 on a mackerel diet primarily. Also coconut oil helps people with early diagnosis of Alzheimer’s & Parkinson’s disease as interviews on youtube rave about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.text: Made her butt all super glossy. I almost lost it then and there Lmao Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: BasementGoods

customer_reviews.title: Cuckoo for Nutiva Coconut Oil
customer_reviews.text: I love cooking with coconut oil. Coconut oil is relatively expensive compared to more traditional alternatives, but Nutiva provides their oil at a fair a price, and it does the job. I'm grateful to be able to afford this oil, as I believe it is the best alternative for cooking in terms of health and wellness. Thanks for making it available on Amazon. I always check the reviews when I purchase a product online. I count on others to help me choose the best option. My reviews are my honest opinion. If my review has helped you in any way, please click the "helpful" button below. If you have any questions feel to leave a comment. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Marty Weil

customer_reviews.title: Quality has gone way down! Shop elsewhere!
customer_reviews.text: I go through coconut oil very quickly. For a long time I loved this product but the last two times I ordered it stunk like burnt popcorn. This last time I ordered, I figured I'd just deal with it like the time before but when I was scooping it out of the jar I found a huge air pocket. I ordered 78 ounces and got maybe 50. I'm so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chrys R

customer_reviews.title: Best coconut oil ever!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite coconut oil EVER. The coconut flavor is amazing and nothing like the crap bland ones at the grocery store. It's definitely worth the extra money for Nutiva. I know 78 ounces will last me quite a while. I use this for everything from bulletproof coffee to lube, candida overgrowth, yeast infections/uti, frying eggs, baking, hair treatment, homemade toothpastes and so much more!
customer_reviews.author: Chezby

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding and fresh coconut oil!
customer_reviews.text: My dog’s been itching so bad lately and she’s going bald in a few spots, so I used this coconut oil to help with my dogs allergies. I put this directly onto her skin in the places she itches the most. It did help a lot. So now I’m adding it to her food daily. I’ve been doing this for a week now and her fur is getting super soft and she itches so much less. I decided to not just feed this to her daily but also my other dog.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the product, yeah it's 2 pack in big size container. I figured I use coconut oil and now that I can't really go to stores often enough to just to grab, why not buy bulk, I thought it would get me going for at least few months. Surprisingly, product is better than I thought and I have been enjoying this product. Very good quality. I've been using almost everywhere, to pop popcorns, on my rice, vegan desserts... list goes on. Think I would be ordering this instead of going to store. Love the product, quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Isabellee

customer_reviews.title: My skin LOVES this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have dry skin and use this after every shower. Moisturizes way better than lotion does, and my skin is so soft. I used to buy regular coconut oil at the store, but this organic virgin kind is better. Coconut oil gets harder in colder temps, so in the winter, I have to really rub it in my hands to soften it up enough to rub it on my skin. This doesn't get as hard in cold temps, so I can apply it quicker. I feel the price is great as well! Will continue to buy this brand again!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: Smaller then I thought. Still does the job. I make my own toothpaste, i also do coconut oil pulling. Helps maintain clean soft gums. Also use after showers. Fantastic massage & cooking oil this is a great everything you need with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Smells awful! Like old rancid oil!!!
customer_reviews.text: I usually purchase Spectrum brand coccnut oil and it it always delicious and smells like a day at the beach. I gave this brand a try and the smell was offensive, like they just stamped a good use by date on some old oil from 5 years ago. Horrible odor. So since the last 2 purchases from Amazon were smelly old oils I have been buying local. I purchased this a while back, I immediately threw it out but I remember the expiration date was 2018. Do not purchase this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Cynderella

customer_reviews.title: HEAVEN WILL hAVE TO wAIT !
customer_reviews.text: I read all about Nutiva and liked what they said. Their coconut oil process was reassuring. I love it. Only been a few weeks but I'm very optomistic about the progress I've felt and seen so far. I'm going to be 86 in 2 months but now I'm aiming for another half century. Thanks Nutiva !
customer_reviews.author: Edmund Shea

customer_reviews.title: Smelled funny.
customer_reviews.text: The product had 2 experation dates on top of the lid and 1 of them was almost a year old. It also didn't smell that good. I was afraid to taste it. I made use of it by using it on my very, very long hair. I won't be purchasing Nutiva products, again.
customer_reviews.author: Jason and Lenzi

customer_reviews.title: Pricey coconut oil
customer_reviews.text: I found this same size and same type of coconut oil at Aldi's for $5.00 after I already purchased this pricier one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for many many uses!
customer_reviews.text: We use this coconut oil to cook, and make out toothpaste as well! I also make body lotion and we feed our cats raw meat mixed with coconut oil so they not only get extra nutrients but also they will fight infections in case they have one! It is also excellent for cooking since coconut oil can handle very high temperatures without breaking its molecules :)
customer_reviews.author: MediaBoxEnt

customer_reviews.title: RANCID OIL BEWARE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Tasted slightly off when I opened it then turned terribly rancid within 2 weeks and became indelible. Actually made me sick and vomit. I used to love this brand, I'm not sure if they changed the content or if it was mishandled. I'm stuck with 2 containers, 1 unopened, as I mistakenly missed my return deadline by a day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just like chips......MOSTLY AIR INSIDE
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because I was running low on coconut oil I got from the local grocery store, and needed things from Amazon anyways. I was recommended this brand, so I went ahead and ordered some. When I first opened it, it appeared to be a completely full container of coconut oil. After dishing some out, I noticed a huge empty space in the middle of the container. The bottle was probably 1/2 full had the oil been compressed. Definitely not buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Miracle oil for the skin!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for 77 year old father in law after he had a severe allergic reaction to bandaids. It cleared up his skin rash overnight and he uses it everyday as lotion on his face, hands, skin, cuts & scrapes. I’ve used this for years on my skin and both my kids since they were babies. Coconut oil is an anti fungal, so heals diaper rash, cuts and worked great on my stretch marks!
customer_reviews.author: Profile

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Coconut oil has a great taste with many health benefits. This is a very good product. I use it internally to replace toxic margarine, corn oil & other unnatural polyunsaturated fats originally developed in Nazi Germany to replace petroleum based oil & grease that was unavailable at the time to grease the Nazi war machine. They fed the artificial oil & grease to the Jewish prisoners & P.O.W.'s! It seems really crazy to me, but most of the manufacturers of the artificial toxic garbage that's poisoning people today are "JEWS"!
customer_reviews.author: Arpad Steven Schummer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for anyone
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years. I apply everyday from shoulders to tip of my toes. I stopped using regular lotions when I found out that the dyes and chemicals in them were literally contributing to dark age spots on my skin. My skin is soft and smooth, I would say for a woman my age, but then I would have to tell you my age!
customer_reviews.author: SueEllen Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Just try it - you’re going to like it
customer_reviews.text: I’m using it mostly for the cooking, but even for that one purpose it’s totally great. One can also use it for the hair and making creams and moisturizers of your own. Totally great.
customer_reviews.author: IrinaTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Delicious high quality
customer_reviews.text: For some reason when this product was initially shipped to me it was placed in a box with other items and no proper packing to keep it safe. When I got home the box was on my porch with a huge wet stain on the bottom of the cardboard somehow it had been smashed and leaked. I could smell the coconut deliciousness. I contacted Amazon and literally in 2 minutes another one was being shipped to me overnight. This is absolutely delicious some of the best tasting coconut oil. I highly recommend it. Ever since beginning my ketogenic diet I find that I use this in everything
customer_reviews.author: Diabolic Genius

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: A great product that was delivered on time in nice packaging. I should have bought a smaller container of coconut oil, but thats my fault, not Nutiva's. Anyways, this is a good product. 10 out of 10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: marisa rios

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time trying coconut oil, I got it for keto baking. It has a great flavor and consistency, really good stuff. Will be getting more!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs with foid and or flea allergies
customer_reviews.text: I had been buying the gallon jug of the refined for my dogs as they all have allergies due to their food and fleas. Im on disability so vet visits and scoldings arent in my budget. A tbsp of this in combination with food grade diatomaceous earth powder eliminates all issues my pups get throughout the year. Fleas? All but gone, allergic continuous scratching til they bleed? Gone! Worm issues? What worms! My dogs wont even touch their food unless i put this on it now! Im much less stressed and i know that they are happier and less stressed w/out the skin issues. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: anna campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: We use a lot of coconut oil in our house as we use it for both cooking and personal care such as moisturizer, teeth whitening, makeup removal etc. good coconut oil can get expensive so I decided to look at my options online and found this . Great price so I ordered. It arrives before the estimated date which is always a big plus. The products large size is great and the quality and texture are wonderful. I now have it set up for auto delivery and always have good coconut oil on hand for all our needs
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this coconut oil for my skin and it is absolutely divine! Helped soothe the effects of my retinol treatment and now I use it all over my body. I'll lock in serums and moisturizers on my face by topping it all with this. My skin is so soft and this coconut oil smells so good! I actually stand there for minutes after application just smelling the jar - no joke haha! I am so insanely happy with this coconut oil and my skin will never be without it! Gonna get the gallon next time I wanna take a bath in this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: K Red

customer_reviews.title: Good product and GOOD COMPANY
customer_reviews.text: Usually I just go to the market and grab whatever cold-pressed organic is cheapest. This time I did a lot of research regarding sustainability, manner of processing, etc. before choosing an oil. This company appears to run a solid eco- and community-friendly business. Time to stop going cheap and do what is right — and because this product is well priced, its not a big sacrifice like it can be sometimes (hello, eggs?!?) :)
customer_reviews.author: Chrishna

customer_reviews.title: About 2/3 filled.
customer_reviews.text: The container was not filled all the way. 2/3 filled with a hole and depression in the center.
customer_reviews.author: David L Barker

customer_reviews.title: Mehhhh.  Low quality
customer_reviews.text: It was more greasy like vegitable oil when melted then like coconut oil I buy in the grocery store. Coconut oil usually sinks into our hair and makes it buttery soft. This DID NOT. It made our hair squeaky and didn’t add any moisture after styling. I’ve been using it since the weather was warm. And now that the weather is cold no improvement n I’m almost sure it went rancid. The first week despite not double dipping and using a spoon
customer_reviews.author: Aminah

customer_reviews.title: trusted brand. always high quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Uses throughout my home: dogs, hair, weight loss (taking daily), cooking Type: multiple bottles, refined, unrefined I try others just to see-including the amazon brand and always return to Nutiva. They are a transparent company and the quality is unrivaled. It might not be the least inexpensive but I feel-in this case-you absolutely get what you pay for. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: beauty+brains

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic value!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product! Living in Phoenix, AZ I really have to up my moisturizing game so I use coconut oil for EVERYTHING! I'm talking everything from "pulling" and brushing my teeth with Activated Charcoal to daily face moisturizer, weekly overnight hair mask (wrap in a towel!) and even repackage for gifts as hand salve and lip balm.
customer_reviews.author: F

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: This product was a little hard to scrape out but its a solid, kind of expected that.... but the product really did make my hair much softer, i lathered in 2 tablespoons melted in the microwave and left it in overnight. this morning when i washed and dried my hair. its much softer. I have color treated hair as well... you get a decent size for the price you pay. I would recommend this product to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: BIG JUG OF OIL
customer_reviews.text: Be prepared, there is a lot of oil in this jug. One of my favorites, but was a little unprepared for the amount. I'll be moving the oil to smaller containers before use. Well worth the money on special!
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: NASTY COCANUT OIL👎👎👎👎
customer_reviews.text: I brought this cocanut oil in Febuary, however I never even opened the jar until today, because i was gathering other products to make body butter. To my dismay I open this jar to find it partially used and it has mold. Its too late to return it, so I've been had. However, this product deserves a minus 10.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: NEVER stick
customer_reviews.text: I use this for all my cooking. Coconut oil is THE most healthy. I also hate nonstick pans. Doesn't matter not using a non-stick pan with this, the pan, even with cheese cooked on, wipes right out. I love the virgin coconut oil as it has a very light coconut flavor. The refined tastes more like shortening. I am extremely lactose intolerant and avoid even butter. This completely replaces butter (won't use margarine as it is next thing to plastic) and just about every other oil product.
customer_reviews.author: candiceanne

customer_reviews.title: Nuniva Organic coconut oil
customer_reviews.text: Great product as a healthy alternative from unhealthy oils. I use this to sauté vegetables,on toast, pancakes & awesome on your skin. Has a great taste & sometimes I add to my morning cup of coffe.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Cooks

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: Very very disappointed when I received my Nutiva coconut oil. It WAS NOT solid as shown in the pictures. It is a liquid!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Workman

customer_reviews.title: Always Nutiva
customer_reviews.text: I always have a jar of Nutiva. I got a larger jar since I did not feel like making the coconut oil. I cook sparingly with this oil; when I do, the flavor is just right, not overpowering. I primarily use this for beauty products (like aloe vera & coconut oil) and will only use Nutiva.
customer_reviews.author: Charmed Muggle

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff, have used it for a year
customer_reviews.text: I have used this off and on for a year while traveling. It works great. I actually tried to purchase a different brand that was also very highly rated on here and cheaper for more and found out upon arrival it was not pure coconut oil even though the other company claimed theirs was. I will be buying this exact bottle from Nutiva again.
customer_reviews.author: A Thoughtful Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite oil for a massage
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and so do my clients! I am a massage therapist and this is my number #1 go to oil for my massages. It's organic, moisturizing, high-quality, and easy to wash out of the sheets compared to other oils. The glide this oil provides is excellent as well so a little goes a long way. Yes, I do use this for cooking too and absolutely love the flavor that it adds to my dishes. I prefer the natural smell and taste of the coconut, and this one does not disappoint. I highly recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Khadijah S

customer_reviews.title: This is the best coconut oil
customer_reviews.text: Of all coconut oils I've tried, this one is the best. It has a nice NATURAL coconut flavor and fragrance. Others I've tried seemed like it was artificially added. It arrived in the summer in Florida, so for me, it was in a liquid state and therefor very easy to "spread". When I lived in Ohio, it was typically in a solid state as the room temps were cooler there. Also a surprise, this oil arrived in only 1 day!
customer_reviews.author: GoodGuy

customer_reviews.title: Organic, good flavor and texture
customer_reviews.text: Organic, good flavor and texture. Unrefined is healthier to eat. Cook it at less than 350°F — its smoke point; above that temperature, coconut oil denatures. I like this brand, very reliable product quality. Also good on skin; the best massage oil, as it doesn't get sticky.
customer_reviews.author: BBMagpie

customer_reviews.title: coconut oil is one of those products that lasts SO ...
customer_reviews.text: coconut oil is one of those products that lasts SO long, however this brand just did not hold up. It turned brown and got a weird smell after only a month or two. Very strange and has not happened with any other brands that I use.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Wish they made a less messy way of getting it out of the container.
customer_reviews.text: I tend to pour mines out. This is Hawaii so its always in liquid form and tends to drip all over. Would be great if they made a non-drip, pourable container. Other than that it seems to have all the benefits one can expect from coconut oil. After reading that it can help cure alzheimers I pour it in my smoothies everyday. *Tip - blend all ingredients first then add oil and blend again. More of it gets into the mix instead of sticking on the walls of the smoothie cup. 2-3 Tbsps daily to save your brain - worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck’s gf

customer_reviews.title: Love it, texture is great
customer_reviews.text: bought the coconut oil for my dog. We have been feeding him coconut oil with his kibbles since he's a puppy and he generally loves coconut oil but he LOVES this one! I feel the texture for this particular brand seems to be finer than other brands. Since it's a twin pack, I am keeping one for myself but i am mostly pleased with my dog's reaction to this new oil. His coat is going to be super shiny again :)
customer_reviews.author: LCStone

customer_reviews.title: It smells SO good and it feels so good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I like to give my dog coconut oil sometimes, because I like to cook with coconut oil, and because I love to slather it all over my body sometimes after I shower. You can tell it's good quality because the texture is perfect and because it smells so delicious. If you're gonna use this much coconut oil, don't hesitate to purchase this! It's sold at such a good price and it's of incredible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Won't be ordering this anymore!
customer_reviews.text: The lid was cracked and oil spilled out. I need customer service to contact me. What a mess!
customer_reviews.author: opensaysme

customer_reviews.title: Unsure if I should consune it since the product jar is coated in oil!
customer_reviews.text: It came with coconut oil on the outside of the oil jar. I am concerned about if it was sealed safely. Luckily, it was sealed inside a plastic bag. There is an inside lid seal, which I cannot tell if it is safely sealed
customer_reviews.author: Trail Runner

customer_reviews.title: Very good product! Will not buy it again in plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good product! However, I will not buy it again in plastic containers. First , the coconut oil is not filedl to the top of the container . Also, the quality seems to be different than the glass container, It does not solidify as it does in the glass container at the same temperatures.
customer_reviews.author: HG

customer_reviews.title: Hydrates and moisturizes
customer_reviews.text: Having asked several people with beautiful skin their secret, they all told me coconut oil. Extensive research for the best led me to Nutria. Very happy to have found it. It has been mentioned that it separated. Well, it’s oil, folks! Stick it in the fridge/freezer it will solidify. Mine was on the counter and the heat of the lights which are left on 24/7 melted mine. After putting in the freezer to bring it back, I keep it under my sink. Of course, I then rub it between my hands to liquify. Ain’t life ironic??!
customer_reviews.author: Grammy70

customer_reviews.title: Nice. Really nice coconut oil.
customer_reviews.text: I use this coconut oil for; Culinary dishes Add it to my hand and body lotion I have a separated container where I keep some of it among my dog's bathing kit, as I rubbed on her skin after her bathing. She is old, 14. It works miracles on her aged-dried skin! It also smells great. I am from the Tropics, so I love the smell of coconut! Nice coconut oil.
customer_reviews.author: Mari ave

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST TASTING COCONUT OIL
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love this product!!! I use it everywhere and in everything I possibly can, it's soooo good for you! Yes, medical people will discourage its use because it has too much saturated fat. Well....I'm sure not going to worry about that when the other benefits outweigh what I see as a "minor problem"!! My husband and I both take Organic Apple Cider Vinegar every day, so this will handle the concern over the fats....The taste of this coconut oil is THE BEST!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G

customer_reviews.title: Quality at its Best
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand. I eat a tablespoon a day and it helps keep me regular. Best of all, it has winderful flavor. I also message it into my scalp, leave on for 30 minutes then blend into my hair, shampoo and rinse. My scalp is dry and this helps add moisture on my hair and scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry P.

customer_reviews.title: Unrefined and Organic
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth and aromatic. Mainly using to pull. Nice big size for the price. Can’t comment on spreading since where i live its relatively warm and so it’s in liquid form. Most likely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Julio

customer_reviews.title: Coconut oil.  So many uses!
customer_reviews.text: The benefits from using this coconut oil are limitless. I use for my pets, my home, my beauty products, cooking and so many more great benefits. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: MFrancis

customer_reviews.title: Fake coconut oil
customer_reviews.text: This product is not real coconut oil. Real coconut oil does not melt and stay melted when there’s no humidity. That was a waste of my money. Lack of time didn’t allow me to return this junk.
customer_reviews.author: Violene Toussaint

customer_reviews.title: Consistently good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this oil for a long time. Cooking, oil pulling, soap making, cosmetic making, it has been wonderful. The flavor is always consistent and so is the quality. Other brands have had on and off quality but not Nutiva. What I've noticed is that some oils may be adulterated as they get rancid smells or taste like soap and not coconut, but never with Nutiva.
customer_reviews.author: Sniffs Incense

customer_reviews.title: good for inside and outside use, cooking and skin care, and this brand is our favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is a favorite, they've changed the bottle over the years, but this is our go to coconut oil. We use it for skin care, moisturizer, and cooking. Best brownies ever :D I was given a bottle of another brand, and it didn't smell or taste as yummy as nutiva. This is the only brand I'll buy! This has cured my cracked heals, our dog's dry nose, AND is perfect in the kitchen for baking. So many uses!
customer_reviews.author: Beaglegirl

customer_reviews.title: Not For Me!
customer_reviews.text: My gripe is not with the coconut oil, it is with the container. Like many, I apply coconut oil to my skin. However, the opening on the jar is so narrow that I cannot get to the last two inches. Sometimes the oil is in liquid form but other times it is a solid. Sure, I can scoop it out with a spoon, but then I have to put the excess back into the jar or find another container. Thank goodness there is another provider who provides their coconut oil in a wide mouth jar! Packaging is important.
customer_reviews.author: Selim Gamer

customer_reviews.title: Extreme Softness and The Best Coconut Smell!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product and I received the shipment on Sunday 19/20 and I couldn't believe that since the same day I've been using it, my whole skin adsorbed it completely and It delicious aroma of coconut it's amazing and my skin felts as soft as the baby skin literally. No wonder they call it the #1 in the top ten list of the best coconut oils available. I love it! People you should buy it and I assure you that you will love it too, trust me.
customer_reviews.author: Maria M Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: Not that much of a coconut flavor. I made a small steak last night and sliced some fresh garlic with 2 TBSP of this coconut oil. After it was cooked, I scraped the bottom of the pan and ate the spoonfuls of coconut oil with the steak drippings/seasonings - it was SO DELICIOUS, and very satisfying. I'll buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Singer Girl

customer_reviews.title: Mine was very liquidy...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first organic oil that I’ve had that would soften up with even the slightest warmth. It rarely hardens when it’s in a 70+ degrees temps. I don’t know if it’s normal, maybe I got a bad batch. From what I can tell it seems to be OK, and it does make measuring it a little bit easier, but I’m still not used to it being so thin and liquidy.
customer_reviews.author: Bart

customer_reviews.title: Multiple use product 5 stars *****
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I bought it for topical use on my dogs skin, and to to his food. The condition of his skin in 2 weeks has greatly improved, and his hair is growing back. Also, tasty to cook with.
customer_reviews.author: Linda W Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Love it 😍
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to add a spoon of it to my coffee substitute, Dandy dandelion and it was soo yummy, the first thing I love about it was the smell, I don’t like the smell of other brands but this is just soo refreshing and I don’t know I love it.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great product for great price
customer_reviews.text: Love this coconut oil. Great price and I use it for everything from my skin to my dog's food. My dog used to have skin issues due to allergies. She hasn't had skin issues since I started putting coconut oil on her food. I also noticed that over time, my skin has gotten much smoother. I used to get small rough bumps on the back of my arms and legs. Not anymore. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: mmgood

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: When I started the KETO diet, everyone said I had to get coconut oil. They said use it to cook with, eat a spoonful everyday, put it in your coffee. That would be great, but it's kind of weird when everything tastes like coconut. I thought it would be a bit more flavor neutral, I was wrong. So, in short, if you want scrambled eggs that taste like coconut, this might be for you, if not, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Gk

customer_reviews.title: Great oil
customer_reviews.text: Great coconut oil and for two jugs, it’s a great value. The container lasts a long time and I have no complaints. Use it for baking, cooking, hair care, makeup removal and skin moisturizer. It can literally be used for anything!
customer_reviews.author: GThiel

customer_reviews.title: So many uses, amazing for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I have been using coconut oil for a while now. Its the best lotion for dry skin by far. Biggest downside is you stay greasy for about an hour and will grease up anything you touch so be mindful of that. Otherwise it has been a joy for me and my family to use.
customer_reviews.author: I hate walmart

customer_reviews.title: Not Fresh
customer_reviews.text: I use to get fresh crystal clear coconut oil from this brand but the last 3 shipments I have gotten its cloudy and always has this slimy residue at the bottom, even thought I bottle these oil into smaller bottles the residue is still present from the top of the oil . I am getting very disappointed in the quality as of present. . I may have to try a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Candy Apple40

customer_reviews.title: Its Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: Good, tasty and amazing on hair, skin, food. Nice light coconut smell. Using it in your pans when you cook improves the taste of everything without those things tasting like coconut. Eating a little of this with organic honey is WOW. One of the most amazing uses I can think of for this oil is on your face. Light. No smell once it's on the face. You have to feel it to believe it. The only reason it doesn't get 5 stars is I needed more so I went to the swansonvitamins site and got a much better deal on a larger container for the same or better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Stern

customer_reviews.title: Near expiration
customer_reviews.text: I received on August 8, 2020 . Look at expiration date
customer_reviews.author: Susan Ev

customer_reviews.title: Coco-whaaa?!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I had to put a neutral review on this one. Product; I ended up not using it for its original purpose, which was for cooking/ baking and hair/beauty. I ended up using it as part of my cleaning products for the house as a deep cleaner mixed with vinegar and baking soda. To get rid of stains around the house. My item came expired. Shipping; Amazon was all for helping me rectify the issue. I didnt have to plead. It was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Fa_Na

customer_reviews.title: Did I mention versatility?
customer_reviews.text: ❤️ ¿¿¿Is there anything this stuff can’t do??? ❤️ 🌴🥥🌴 You can use it to cook,👨‍🍳 condition your skin, 💆‍♀️ lips, 👄 hair, 🧖🏽‍♀️ the choice is yours... 🤐 even fights 💪static cling and dull wood and leather (don’t do floors with slick substances!🤕🤦🏻‍♀️🤣)
customer_reviews.author: tammi

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I don’t use this for cooking but for skin only. I also shave with it. This is the only brand of coconut oil that I really love. The smell is divine - natural warm and nutty. Doesn’t smell anything like fake coconut products, which I hate. Only thing that keeps away dry skin in the dead of winter for me. Couldn’t live without it! Love this HUGE container!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Swear by it!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a resident at an Assisted Living I go to for my job as a Volunteer Coordinator for Hospice. She has psoriasis on her arms and hands . Since using this her psoriasis has calmed considerably and she’s had great relief!! I swear by it! My dry skin soaks it up. Love love love it!
customer_reviews.author: spat210

customer_reviews.title: Great skin conditioner
customer_reviews.text: Coconut oil is an excellent skin conditioner being naturally anti bacterial and anti fungal. Great for nightly massage of residual limb before putting on shrinker sock for the night. This size container is about a year supply for skin care.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and wonderful. Using it for many things
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, it just smells divine. Fresh and wonderful. Using it for many things, love ke lotion and chopstick for sensitive skin. Mire importantly, using it to treat a macrophage yeast infection... In conjunction with genetan violet. A two years of Prescription medications failed to resolve the macrophaged infection... Two weeks of this natural remedy and the doctor wanted to know what we used because it's almost fully healed. I couldn't be more satisfied. Also, my aspie son LOVES how it tastes and feels on his skin. Don
customer_reviews.author: Cate

customer_reviews.title: GREAT COCONUT OIL
customer_reviews.text: You won't be sorry. I love this for the health benefits, purest flavor, diversity, and (a secret) for my coffee! I've been a steady customer for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Saved by Grace

product_meta.title: Nutiva Organic, Cold-Pressed, Unrefined, Virgin Coconut Oil from Fresh, non-GMO, Sustainably Farmed Coconuts, 15 Fl Oz (Pack of 2)
product_meta.description: Nutiva Organic, Cold-Pressed, Unrefined, Virgin Coconut Oil from Fresh, non-GMO, Sustainably Farmed Coconuts, 15 Fluid Ounces (Pack of 2)
feature_bullets: NATURALLY EXTRACTED and NUTRIENT DENSE: Nutiva’s all-natural cold press extraction process yields a pure, light-tasting, nutrient-rich oil containing 63% medium chain triglycerides and 50% lauric acid without the use of dangerous and harmful chemicals, hexane, or heat.
PREMIUM DIET COMPATIBILITY: Nutiva Virgin Coconut Oil is an ideal addition to vegetarian, vegan, raw, whole food, paleo, ketogenic, and gluten-free diets.
HEALTH AND BEAUTY: Nutiva Virgin Coconut Oil has natural moisturizing and deep conditioning properties, making it an invaluable part of every body care regimen.

COMMITMENT TO QUALITY: Nutiva partners with organic farmers to source the world’s finest fresh, organic virgin coconuts and stringently adheres to USDA certified organic and non-GMO guidelines to deliver superfood that is good for you and good for the planet.
EASY TO USE PACKAGING: Nutiva Virgin Coconut Oil is packaged in safe, convenient, BPA-free packaging.

Directions: No Refrigeration Required. Coconut Oil Is Solid At Room Temperature And Melts At 76 Degrees, With A Smoke Point Of 350 Degrees. Please Note That There Is No Difference Between Virgin And Extra-Virgin Coconut Oil. We Previously Used The Term "Extra-Virgin" To Emphasize Our Commitment To Quality, However, As A Leader In Coconut Oil, Nutiva Is Committed To Complying With Global Regulations That Do Not Allow The Term "Extra-Virgin" In Regard To Coconut. When You See The Term Virgin On Our Packaging, Rest Assured That The Product Is Still The Highest Quality And Has Not Changed.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
